forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
